HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"The only hate about illegal invading Mexicans is their hate for our laws and their hate for our love of our OWN country. We must export them"
"There should be a 5th school in Keller for only Homosexuals, Feminists, and Trannies"
"That's the point!! We need young people, not old selfish farts. "
"If ur gonna hate White America, hate it for something it actually did. Spaniards wiped out most Indians 200 years before America was born."
"Feminist:\n\nSomeone who believes the radical notion that women are people."
"#Multiculturalism is jewish racial supremacy by fraudulent debt slavery to private Central Banks & demographic #WhiteGenocide."
"RT @_FucK_aH_fRiEnD: The world coming too an end because the young ppl getting shot and becoming gay"
"RT @europafreunde: Tear gas fired as Islamic invaders smash #Greece-#Macedonia border with battering ram - Need to use live rounds"
"RT @CaitMcNickle: @YesYoureRacist & @homophobes make me angry/sad. Everyone read them. They show how absurd & ignorant hate is."
"Girls over 4'3... hit the gym fatass"
